Harmony is a minimalitstic stitching layer for composable software.


## Basic Usage

```
bit install @bitdev/harmony.harmony
```

## Start a new Harmony platform

Start a new Harmony platform:

```
bit new harmony my-platform --aspect bitdev.harmony/harmony-env
```


- [API Reference](https://bit.cloud/bitdev/harmony/api-reference)
